column5: said on the afternoon of 27 August that a python that climbed on people’s houses around Otres Beach in Stung Hav district on the night of August 26
column6: had been captured.------The snake was handed it over to the Otres commune police in Stung Hav district
column7: and then to environment officers to release the snake back into the wild safely.------The python climbed on people’s houses around Prek Treng beach last night
column8: swallowing a chicken. After the incident
column9: the owner of the house brought the family and children out of the house for one night to prevent danger to people. It was not until the morning that the snake was caught and handed over to the Stung Hav district police and released into the wild. KPS
